net.antidot.api.search

Class ReplySetHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.antidot.api.search.ReplySetHelper

  • public class ReplySetHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper to access replies from one feed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReplySetHelper(ReplySet replySetPb, FacetRegistry facetRegistry, QueryCoder queryCoder, Query query)
      Constructs helper from reply set protobuf.

    • Method Summary

      Retrieves meta data of the reply set.

      Retrieves pager of the reply set.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReplySetHelper

        public ReplySetHelper(ReplySet replySetPb,
              FacetRegistry facetRegistry,
              QueryCoder queryCoder,
              Query query)
        Constructs helper from reply set protobuf.
        Parameters:
        replySetPb - [in] Google protobuf.
        Throws:
        IncompleteReplySetException - no meta data available for the reply set (this should never happen).

    • Method Detail

      • getMeta

        public MetaHelper getMeta()
        Retrieves meta data of the reply set.
        Returns:
        reply set meta data.

      • hasPager

        public boolean hasPager()
        Checks whether reply set contains a pager.
        Returns:
        true when a pager is defined, false otherwise.

      • getPager

        public PagerHelper getPager()
        Retrieves pager of the reply set. Pager can be null when all results are present in the first page.
        Returns:
        pager of the reply set.

      • getReplies

        public java.util.List<ReplyHelper> getReplies()
        Retrieves replies of the reply set. Returned list can be empty if there is no reply available.
        Returns:
        replies of the reply set.

      • getFacets

        public java.util.List<FacetHelper> getFacets()
        Retrieves facets of the reply set. Returned list can be empty if there is no facet configured.
        Returns:
        facets of the reply set.
